homeAboutText1: Gloria Logistic company carries out work on complex or cosmetic interior repairs. Our experts will bring to life any design project for the repair or reconstruction of the premises. We are ready to carry out its further maintenance.
homeAboutText2: Gloria Logistic provides a guarantee for the work performed. Due to its extensive experience in construction, our company will carry out high-quality renovation of an apartment, residential or non-residential building, store, shopping center and other turnkey facilities. We will draw up an estimate, select the necessary materials, and offer interesting solutions at an acceptable cost.
homeAboutText3: Many Gloria Logistic clients, who ordered repairs for the first time, subsequently become our regular customers, as we value our reputation as a reliable and highly professional contractor.
advatageItem1: assistance in budgeting and selection of materials
homeFixing2: covering and painting walls and ceilings
homeFixing4: cleaning or replacing the floor covering
homeFixing6: re-planning and redesign of apartments and houses
